response.overview: A few days in the life of a barrack of Auschwitz... Dr Mengele, his two female assistants, and even the capo of the barrack humiliate and torture the poor inmates. Jealousy, hatred, anger and fear... Four beauties are whipped with a single-tail, another one severly caned. The creators of the film DO NOT identify with the Nazi conceptions at all. The film illustrates the brutality of this historical period; the uniforms are used exclusively for portraying the era in an authentic way.
response.title: Dr. Mengele
